title: Problems of log in while in a game
body:
Dear Riot

I had problems to attempt to log in while in a game, but the system considered me afk. Afterwards, I got leavebuster for 20min for 5 games. Right now, Riot is trying to fix it (which is a Riot's problem), but the system gives me penalty. Is there a way to fix leavebuster which is not my fault?

replies.body: The current offline error message is currently being investigated, and we have a[ workaround pinned](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline).  It sucks that you got a leaverbuster as a result, and we're down to take a look at your case individually.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can work something out!
